name: job update-Empty fileds
description:
Fields can you can update using this method are below. They're not required. That's why it's partial update.  
  

- name
    
- description
    
- job_type
    
- location
    
- salary_range
    
- salary_currency
    
- salary_negotiable (boolean)
    
- responsibilities (list)
    
- qualifications (list)
    
- skills_required
    
- application_deadline
    
- accepting_applications (boolean)
